    • Method Detail

      • setRpcTracing

        public void setRpcTracing​(RpcTracing rpcTracing)
        ExtensionLoader supplies the tracing implementation which must be named "rpcTracing". For example, if using the SpringExtensionInjector, only a bean named "rpcTracing" will be injected.

        Custom parsing

        Custom parsers, such as RpcTracing.clientRequestParser(), can use Dubbo-specific types DubboRequest and DubboResponse to get access such as the Java invocation or result.

      • invoke

        public org.apache.dubbo.rpc.Result invoke​(org.apache.dubbo.rpc.Invoker<?> invoker,

                                   throws org.apache.dubbo.rpc.RpcException
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        org.apache.dubbo.rpc.RpcException
